test_suites.name: Test Suite Trello WorkSpace Management
test_suites.description: Comprehensive test suite for Trello Workspace functionality

test_cases.name: Create New Workspace
test_cases.description: Verify user can create a new workspace successfully using existing Chrome Profile
preconditions: Chrome Driver is updated
User Data Directory exists (D:\ChromeTest)
Chrome Profile 2 is configured and logged in
Port 9222 is available

steps.description: Initialize ChromeDriver with Custom Options (Profile 2, Debug Port)

test_cases.expected_result: Workspace 'abcs' created successfully and user is navigated to invite members screen

test_cases.name: TC_WORKSPACE_ADD_02
test_cases.description: Verify Create Workspace button remains disabled when Workspace Name is empty, even if Description is filled and Workspace Type is selected
preconditions: Local Environment: Folder 'D:\ChromeTest' must exist
Browser State: Chrome Profile 'Profile 2' is configured and explicitly logged into Trello
System: Debugging Port 9222 must be free
Driver: ChromeDriver matches Chrome version

steps.description: Verify Create button is disabled (Crucial Step: Failure due to empty Name)

test_cases.expected_result: Create button remains disabled because Workspace Name is mandatory, regardless of Description or Type content

test_cases.name: TC_WORKSPACE_ADD_03
test_cases.description: Verify Create Workspace button is disabled when 'Workspace Type' is not selected
preconditions: Local Environment: Folder 'D:\ChromeTest' must exist
Browser State: Chrome Profile 'Profile 2' is configured and explicitly logged into Trello
System: Debugging Port 9222 must be free (no conflicting Chrome instances)
Network: Stable internet connection to access trello.com
Driver: ChromeDriver version matches the installed Chrome browser version

steps.description: Enter Workspace Description (Skipping Workspace Type selection)
Verify Create button remains disabled due to missing Workspace Type

test_cases.expected_result: User cannot create workspace without selecting a Workspace Type

test_cases.name: TC_WORKSPACE_ADD_04
test_cases.description: Verify successful workspace creation with valid name and empty description
preconditions: Local Environment: Folder 'D:\ChromeTest' must exist
Browser State: Chrome Profile 'Profile 2' is configured and explicitly logged into Trello
System: Debugging Port 9222 must be free (no conflicting Chrome instances)
Network: Stable internet connection to access trello.com
Driver: ChromeDriver version matches the installed Chrome browser version

steps.description: Click Invite Members link (Verification of success)

test_cases.expected_result: Workspace 'abc2' created successfully and user is navigated to invite screen
test_cases.verification_method: Successful navigation to Invite Members screen

test_cases.name: TC_WORKSPACE_ADD_05
test_cases.description: Verify Create Workspace button is disabled when Workspace Name is empty
preconditions: Local Environment: Folder 'D:\ChromeTest' must exist
Browser State: Chrome Profile 'Profile 2' is configured and explicitly logged into Trello
System: Debugging Port 9222 must be free (no conflicting Chrome instances)
Network: Stable internet connection to access trello.com

steps.description: Verify Create button is disabled due to empty Name

test_cases.expected_result: User cannot create workspace without entering a Workspace Name

test_cases.name: TC_WORKSPACE_ADD_06
test_cases.description: Verify Create Workspace button remains disabled when Workspace Name is empty, even if Workspace Type is selected
preconditions: Local Environment: Folder 'D:\ChromeTest' must exist
Browser State: Chrome Profile 'Profile 2' is configured and explicitly logged into Trello
System: Debugging Port 9222 must be free (no conflicting Chrome instances)

steps.description: Verify Create button is disabled due to empty Name

test_cases.expected_result: Create button remains unclickable when Name is missing, despite Type being selected

test_cases.name: TC_WORKSPACE_ADD_07
test_cases.description: Verify Create Workspace button remains disabled when Workspace Name is valid but Workspace Type and is missing (Description empty)
preconditions: Local Environment: Folder 'D:\ChromeTest' must exist
Browser State: Chrome Profile 'Profile 2' is configured and explicitly logged into Trello
System: Debugging Port 9222 must be free (no conflicting Chrome instances)
Network: Stable internet connection to access trello.com

steps.description: Enter Workspace Description (Empty) - Skipping Workspace Type

steps.description: Verify Create button is disabled due to invalid name format (whitespace)

test_cases.name: Edit Workspace Name
test_cases.description: Verify user can rename an existing workspace successfully
preconditions: Browser State: Chrome Profile 'Profile 2' is configured and explicitly logged into Trello
Chrome Driver is updated
User Data Directory exists (D:\ChromeTest)
Workspace 'Edit 1' exists

steps.description: Initialize ChromeDriver with Custom Options (Profile 2, Debug Port)
Click Settings tab of the Workspace

test_cases.expected_result: Workspace renamed from 'Edit 1' to 'fa' successfully

test_cases.name: Change Workspace Visibility to Public
test_cases.description: Verify user can change workspace visibility settings from Private/Work to Public
preconditions: Browser State: Chrome Profile 'Profile 2' is configured and explicitly logged into Trello
Chrome Driver is updated
Chrome Profile 2 is configured
Workspace 'Edit 2' exists

steps.description: Initialize ChromeDriver with Custom Options (Profile 2, Debug Port)
Click Settings tab of the Workspace

test_cases.expected_result: Workspace visibility is successfully updated to Public

test_cases.name: Rename Workspace - Invalid Input (Empty Name)
test_cases.description: Verify that the Save button is disabled when attempting to clear the workspace name (empty input)
preconditions: Chrome Driver is updated
Browser State: Chrome Profile 'Profile 2' is configured and explicitly logged into Trello
Workspace 'Edit 3' exists

steps.description: Initialize ChromeDriver with Custom Options (Profile 2, Debug Port)
Click Settings tab of the Workspace
Clear the workspace name (enter empty string)
Verify Save button is disabled/not clickable

test_cases.expected_result: Save button is not clickable when name field is empty

test_cases.name: Rename Workspace - Invalid Input (Whitespace)
test_cases.description: Verify that the Save button is disabled when attempting to rename a workspace with only whitespace characters
preconditions: Chrome Driver is updated
Browser State: Chrome Profile 'Profile 2' is configured and explicitly logged into Trello
Workspace 'Edit 4' exists

steps.description: Initialize ChromeDriver with Custom Options (Profile 2, Debug Port)
Click Settings tab of the Workspace
Verify Save button is disabled/not clickable

test_cases.expected_result: Save button is not clickable, preventing the user from saving an empty name

test_cases.name: TC_WORKSPACE_EDIT_05
test_cases.description: Verify Edit Workspace Name successful when New Name has 1 character (Boundary value - Minimum valid length)
preconditions: Local Environment: Folder 'D:\ChromeTest' must exist
Browser State: Chrome Profile 'Profile 2' is configured and explicitly logged into Trello
Workspace 'Edit 5' must exist beforehand to perform the edit action

steps.description: Click on the target Workspace (Dynamic Object)
Click on Settings tab of the Workspace (Dynamic Object)
Click Edit button (Pencil icon) next to Workspace name
Click Save button to apply changes

test_cases.expected_result: Workspace name is updated successfully to 'A'
test_cases.verification_method: Implicit verification via Save action success

Click Save button to apply changes

test_cases.expected_result: Workspace name is updated successfully to the 100-character string
test_cases.verification_method: Implicit verification via Save action success

test_cases.name: TC_WORKSPACE_EDIT_09
test_cases.description: Verify Error Message appears and Save button remains disabled when Workspace Name has 101 characters (Boundary value - Exceeding maximum length)

Click on Settings tab of the Workspace (Dynamic Object)
Click Edit button (Pencil icon) next to Workspace name

Verify Save button is disabled due to name length > 100

test_cases.name: Delete Workspace - Positive Case
test_cases.description: Verify user can successfully delete an existing workspace by entering the workspace name for confirmation
preconditions: Chrome Driver is updated
Browser State: Chrome Profile 'Profile 2' is configured and explicitly logged into Trello
Workspace 'Delete 1' exists

steps.description: Initialize ChromeDriver with Custom Options (Profile 2, Debug Port)
Wait for workspace details to load
Click Settings tab of the Workspace
Wait for Delete Workspace section to appear
Enter workspace name to confirm deletion

test_cases.expected_result: Workspace 'Delete 1' is permanently deleted and success message is displayed

test_cases.name: Delete Workspace - Invalid Confirmation Name
test_cases.description: Verify that the Confirm Delete button remains disabled when the user enters an incorrect workspace name
preconditions: Chrome Driver is updated
Chrome Profile 2 is configured
Workspace 'Delete 2' exists

steps.description: Initialize ChromeDriver with Custom Options (Profile 2, Debug Port)
Click Settings tab of the Workspace
Verify Confirm Delete button is disabled

test_cases.expected_result: Delete button remains unclickable due to mismatched confirmation name

test_cases.name: Delete Workspace - Empty Confirmation Name
test_cases.description: Verify that the Confirm Delete button remains disabled when the user leaves the confirmation name empty
preconditions: Local Environment: Folder 'D:\ChromeTest' must exist
Browser State: Chrome Profile 'Profile 2' is configured and explicitly logged into Trello
Workspace 'Delete 3' must exist beforehand

steps.description: Click Settings tab of the Workspace (Dynamic Object)
Wait for Delete Workspace section to appear
Verify Confirm Delete button is disabled

test_cases.expected_result: Delete button remains unclickable because confirmation name is empty

execution_notes.environment_setup: Requires pre-configured Chrome Profile 2 at D:\ChromeTest with port 9222 enabled
execution_notes.dependencies: Check internet connection and Trello availability before execution
execution_notes.cleanup: Browser is closed after each test case, but state (created workspaces) may persist if delete tests fail

test_suites.name: Test Suite Card Search and Filter Functionality
test_suites.description: Test suite focusing on filtering cards by labels, members, due dates, and keywords within a board

test_cases.name: TC_CARDFILTER_SEARCH_01
test_cases.description: Verify search returns correct results and ONLY matching cards are displayed
preconditions: Browser Profile 2 configured
Board contains cards with 'Plan'

steps.description: Verify ALL visible cards contain the keyword 'Plan'

parameters.check: if (!allMatch) markFailed('C th khng cha t kha xut hin!')

test_cases.expected_result: All displayed cards must contain the keyword 'Plan'

test_cases.name: TC_CARDFILTER_SEARCH_02
test_cases.description: Verify entering whitespace is ignored and all cards remain visible
preconditions: Browser Profile 2 configured
Board has visible cards

steps.description: Verify that cards are still visible (System ignored whitespace)

parameters.check: if (cards.size() == 0) markFailed('Li: H thng n ht th khi nhp khong trng')

test_cases.expected_result: Cards list is NOT empty (System shows all cards)

test_cases.name: TC_CARDFILTER_SEARCH_03
test_cases.description: Verify search returns empty result for non-existent keyword
preconditions: Browser Profile 2 configured
Board does NOT contain 'Abcdefgh'

steps.description: Verify that NO cards are displayed

parameters.check: if (cards.size() > 0) markFailed('Li: Vn tm thy th d t kha khng tn ti')

test_cases.expected_result: Card list must be empty (Size == 0)

test_cases.name: TC_CARDFILTER_SEARCH_04
test_cases.description: Verify search functionality returns no matching results when searching with special characters
preconditions: Local Environment: Folder 'D:\ChromeTest' must exist
Browser State: Chrome Profile 'Profile 2' is configured
Board exists and does NOT contain cards with special characters '$#@$$#@$!@#$!@'

steps.description: Click on the most recent board
Check if 'Clear Filter' button is visible and click it to reset state
Click Filter icon to open search bar
Enter special characters into filter input
Wait for filter results to update
Verify that NO visible card matches the special characters keyword

test_cases.expected_result: No cards containing the special characters are found (found = false)

test_cases.name: TC_CARDFILTER_SEARCH_05
test_cases.description: Verify search functionality returns correct results when entering a partial keyword ('Pl') using strict list verification
preconditions: Local Environment: Folder 'D:\ChromeTest' must exist
Browser State: Chrome Profile 'Profile 2' is configured
Board contains cards with the partial text 'Pl'

steps.description: Click on the most recent board
Check if 'Clear Filter' button is visible and click it to reset state
Click Filter icon to open search bar
Enter partial keyword 'Pl' into filter input
Wait for filter results to update
Verify ALL visible cards contain the partial keyword 'Pl'

parameters.check: if (!allMatch) markFailed('C th khng cha t kha xut hin')

test_cases.expected_result: Only cards containing 'Pl' are displayed (Strict check: allMatch == true)

test_cases.name: TC_CARDFILTER_SEARCH_06
test_cases.description: Verify search functionality is case-insensitive (e.g., searching 'plAN' finds 'Plan') using strict list verification
preconditions: Local Environment: Folder 'D:\ChromeTest' must exist
Browser State: Chrome Profile 'Profile 2' is configured
Board contains cards with text 'Plan' (mixed case allowed)

steps.description: Click on the most recent board
Check if 'Clear Filter' button is visible and click it to reset state
Click Filter icon to open search bar
Enter mixed-case keyword 'plAN' into filter input
Wait for filter results to update
Verify ALL visible cards contain the keyword (ignoring case)

parameters.check: if (!allMatch) markFailed('C th khng cha t kha xut hin')

test_cases.expected_result: Cards containing 'Plan' are displayed despite the input being 'plAN' (Case Insensitive match)

test_cases.name: TC_CARDFILTER_SEARCH_07
test_cases.description: Verify search functionality works correctly with minimum boundary input (1 character) using strict list verification
preconditions: Local Environment: Folder 'D:\ChromeTest' must exist
Browser State: Chrome Profile 'Profile 2' is configured
Board contains cards with the letter 'p'

steps.description: Click on the most recent board
Check if 'Clear Filter' button is visible and click it to reset state
Click Filter icon to open search bar
Wait for filter results to update
Verify ALL visible cards contain the letter 'p'

parameters.check: if (!allMatch) markFailed('C th khng cha t kha xut hin')

test_cases.expected_result: Filter applies correctly for single-character input, showing only cards containing 'p'

test_cases.name: TC_CARDFILTER_SEARCH_08
test_cases.description: Verify search functionality works correctly with near-minimum boundary input (2 characters) using strict list verification
preconditions: Local Environment: Folder 'D:\ChromeTest' must exist
Browser State: Chrome Profile 'Profile 2' is configured
Board contains cards with text containing 'pl'

steps.description: Click on the most recent board
Check if 'Clear Filter' button is visible and click it to reset state
Click Filter icon to open search bar
Wait for filter results to update
Verify ALL visible cards contain the keyword 'pl'

parameters.check: if (!allMatch) markFailed('C th khng cha t kha xut hin')

test_cases.expected_result: Filter applies correctly for 2-character input, showing only cards containing 'pl'

test_cases.name: TC_CARDFILTER_FILTER_01
test_cases.description: Verify filtering functionality works for 'Cards assigned to me' criteria
preconditions: Local Environment: Folder 'D:\ChromeTest' must exist
Browser State: Chrome Profile 'Profile 2' is configured
Board contains at least one card assigned to the current user

steps.description: Click on the most recent board
Check if 'Clear Filter' button is visible and click it to reset state
Click Filter icon to open filter menu
Wait for filter results to update
Verify that cards are displayed (At least one card assigned to user exists)

parameters.check: if (cards.size() == 0) markFailed('Khng tn ti th sau khi lc')

test_cases.expected_result: Cards assigned to the user are displayed (Count > 0)

test_cases.name: TC_CARDFILTER_FILTER_02
test_cases.description: Verify filtering works correctly when combining 'Assigned to me' AND 'Not marked as complete' criteria
preconditions: Local Environment: Folder 'D:\ChromeTest' must exist
Browser State: Chrome Profile 'Profile 2' is configured
Board contains at least one card that is assigned to the user AND not marked as complete

steps.description: Click on the most recent board
Check if 'Clear Filter' button is visible and click it to reset state
Click Filter icon to open filter menu
Wait for filter results to update
Verify that matching cards are displayed (Intersection of both criteria)

parameters.check: if (cards.size() == 0) markFailed('Khng tn ti th sau khi lc')

test_cases.expected_result: Active cards assigned to the user are displayed (Count > 0)

test_cases.name: TC_CARDFILTER_COMBINE_01
test_cases.description: Verify filtering displays results when combining a valid keyword ('Implement') with a matching criteria ('Overdue')
preconditions: Local Environment: Folder 'D:\ChromeTest' must exist
Browser State: Chrome Profile 'Profile 2' is configured
Board contains at least one card with text 'Implement' AND is marked Overdue

steps.description: Click on the most recent board
Check if 'Clear Filter' button is visible and click it to reset state
Click Filter icon to open search bar
Wait for filter results to update
Verify matching cards are displayed (Intersection of 'Implement' AND 'Overdue')

parameters.check: if (cards.size() == 0) markFailed('Fail: Khng c th no hin th')

test_cases.expected_result: At least one card matching both criteria is displayed

test_cases.name: TC_CARDFILTER_COMBINE_02
test_cases.description: Verify filtering yields no results when combining a valid keyword with a non-matching criteria (Keyword 'Maintain' exists but cards are NOT Overdue)
preconditions: Local Environment: Folder 'D:\ChromeTest' must exist
Browser State: Chrome Profile 'Profile 2' is configured
Board contains cards with text 'Maintain' but they are NOT marked as Overdue

steps.description: Click on the most recent board
Check if 'Clear Filter' button is visible and click it to reset state
Click Filter icon to open search bar
Wait for filter results to update
Verify NO cards are displayed (Intersection of 'Maintain' AND 'Overdue' should be empty)

parameters.check: if (cards.size() > 0) markFailed('Li: Vn tm thy th d iu kin kt hp khng tha mn')

test_cases.expected_result: No cards are displayed because no card satisfies BOTH criteria (Keyword + Overdue)

execution_notes.environment_setup: Requires pre-configured Chrome Profile 2 at D:\ChromeTest with port 9222 enabled
execution_notes.dependencies: Target board must contain cards with specific labels, members, and due dates for filtering verification
